DocAttribute.Name: TimeForTask
DocAttribute.Documentation: Contained object for the time related information for the work schedule element.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: There shall only be one single object in the set of relates objects, since the IfcRelAssignsTask establishes an one-to-one relationship.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The related object should be on type IfcTask.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The relating control should be on type IfcWorkControl.
